alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:37PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tippah, northeastern Benton and western Alcorn Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Snow Lake Shores, or 12 miles northwest of Ripley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Canaan, Gravestown, Theo, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Murry, Hightown, Brody, Spring Hill, Collinstown, Crumtown, Lone Pine, Whitten Town, Hamilton, Peoples and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
